definition[0]: used to emphasize that something will still be true if another thing happens
example[0]: She’s going to have problems finding a job even if she gets her A levels.
definition[1]: used to emphasize that, although something may happen or may be true, it will not change a situation
example[1]: I wouldn’t tell you even if I knew.
example[2]: Even if she survives, she’ll never fully recover.
